trans-unit.source: What is the Buy It Local Omaha organization? Buy It Local Omaha (BILO) exists to boost our economy and build local business. We are a non-profit organization designed to both (a) educate the local consumer on the advantages of buying products and services from a local business, and to (b) connect the local consumer and business.

seg-source.mrk: What is the Buy It Local Omaha organization? Buy It Local Omaha (BILO) exists to boost our economy and build local business.

We are a non-profit organization designed to both (a) educate the local consumer on the advantages of buying products and services from a local business, and to (b) connect the local consumer and business.

target.mrk: What is the Buy It Local Omaha organization? Buy It Local Omaha (BILO) exists to boost our economy and build local business.

We are a non-profit organization designed to both (a) educate the local consumer on the advantages of buying products and services from a local business, and to (b) connect the local consumer and business.

trans-unit.source: Members will generate solidarity and a presence in the local community through cooperative advertising. We offer exclusive membership directory services on the BILO web site, local website search tools for member products and services. Networking is possible once each month (September – May) for higher visibility to the consumers. We offer membership kits to include campaign stickers and promotional material, loyalty programs for Business-to-Business and Business-to-Consumer, and a centralized voice for small business advocacy rights within governmental agencies.

seg-source.mrk: Members will generate solidarity and a presence in the local community through cooperative advertising.
We offer exclusive membership directory services on the BILO web site, local website search tools for member products and services.
Networking is possible once each month (September – May) for higher visibility to the consumers.

We offer membership kits to include campaign stickers and promotional material, loyalty programs for Business-to-Business and Business-to-Consumer, and a centralized voice for small business advocacy rights within governmental agencies.

target.mrk: Members will generate solidarity and a presence in the local community through cooperative advertising.
We offer exclusive membership directory services on the BILO web site, local website search tools for member products and services.
Networking is possible once each month (September – May) for higher visibility to the consumers.

We offer membership kits to include campaign stickers and promotional material, loyalty programs for Business-to-Business and Business-to-Consumer, and a centralized voice for small business advocacy rights within governmental agencies.

trans-unit.source: By joining BILO, you show your support and identify yourself as a local business owner to the community and the local consumers.

seg-source.mrk: By joining BILO, you show your support and identify yourself as a local business owner to the community and the local consumers.

target.mrk: By joining BILO, you show your support and identify yourself as a local business owner to the community and the local consumers.

trans-unit.source: Any business or organization that is privately held, and a majority of the ownership is in Douglas, Sarpy, Washington, Dodge, Pottawattamie or Mills Counties, collectively can join. The Board of Directors and/or membership committee may elect to impose additional requirements.

seg-source.mrk: Any business or organization that is privately held, and a majority of the ownership is in Douglas, Sarpy, Washington, Dodge, Pottawattamie or Mills Counties, collectively can join.
The Board of Directors and/or membership committee may elect to impose additional requirements.

target.mrk: Any business or organization that is privately held, and a majority of the ownership is in Douglas, Sarpy, Washington, Dodge, Pottawattamie or Mills Counties, collectively can join.
The Board of Directors and/or membership committee may elect to impose additional requirements.

trans-unit.source: To remain a member, you must maintain good standing in the local business community. Also, members are encouraged to promote the BILO mission with their peers and customers, and to participate in internal and public meetings.

seg-source.mrk: To remain a member, you must maintain good standing in the local business community.
Also, members are encouraged to promote the BILO mission with their peers and customers, and to participate in internal and public meetings.

target.mrk: To remain a member, you must maintain good standing in the local business community.
Also, members are encouraged to promote the BILO mission with their peers and customers, and to participate in internal and public meetings.

trans-unit.source: BILO is different than any other networking or local municipality. BILO believes local businesses are a positive driving force in the community’s economy and through cooperative efforts; the business community can positively influence consumers towards a higher economic yield. The organization will ensure public involvement and support through consumer networking, loyalty programs and promotions, consumer aided tools to make informed buying decisions, and higher local business visibility.

seg-source.mrk: BILO is different than any other networking or local municipality.

BILO believes local businesses are a positive driving force in the community’s economy and through cooperative efforts; the business community can positively influence consumers towards a higher economic yield.

The organization will ensure public involvement and support through consumer networking, loyalty programs and promotions, consumer aided tools to make informed buying decisions, and higher local business visibility.

target.mrk: BILO is different than any other networking or local municipality.

BILO believes local businesses are a positive driving force in the community’s economy and through cooperative efforts; the business community can positively influence consumers towards a higher economic yield.

The organization will ensure public involvement and support through consumer networking, loyalty programs and promotions, consumer aided tools to make informed buying decisions, and higher local business visibility.
